Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A torso with extremely dense muscles, which is able to lift heavier objects with ease.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: hypermyofibrilization

values.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s muscles are growing thicker by the second.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s muscles are much thicker and bulkier. They're dense with veins and raw power. Such an impressive growth is very painful.
[PAWN_nameDef] is a veritable wall of raw power and strength, owing to the powerful mutagen coursing through [PAWN_possessive] veins.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A tough torso, capable of resisting a lot more force than the average torso.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: tough torso

values.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso seems to be a little bulkier than before.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is tougher and could shrug off a firm hit easily. However, the quick muscle growth is too painful for [PAWN_nameDef] to be useful yet.
[PAWN_nameDef']'s torso is practically made of metal with how tough it is. [PAWN_pronoun] is a brick wall of muscle.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A slim and quite frail torso.
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: Diminutive torso

values.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is beginning to slim and shed excess weight. Eating more doesn't seem to have any effect.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is becoming slimmer than before, making them easy to pick up. The weight draining is quite hurtful.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s body is quite a bit slimmer than before. They'd be easy to push over in a fight, and don't stand as much of a chance in combat as before.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A thick and scaled shell. The ultimate cumbersome defense on the Rimworld!
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: turtoise shell

values.description: Thick plates of bone are beginning to grow out from [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest and back.
The two halves of the bone plates have formed a precursor shell around [PAWN_nameDef]'s body. It's still fragile at the moment, but thickening constantly.
A thick and scaled shell for unmatched protection against predators encases [PAWN_nameDef]'s body. [PAWN_pronoun] has a strange urge to live in a sewer.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bones ache slightly. They seem to be getting somewhat lighter.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bones are feeling lighter with every passing hour. They're slightly more fragile and are causing pain to [PAWN_nameDef].
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bones are light and maneuverable. They're denser than human bones, but contain air pockets to reduce the overall weight.
